entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023
